name: Football Superstar: US Edition
description:
Can you become the best football player in the world?

Football Superstar focuses on character development rather than quick reflexes. You start the game as at 18 year old free agent and play until you retire. What happens in-between is up to you!

IMPROVE YOUR ABILITIES
As you gain experience, you can upgrade abilities that suit your playing style and position. Perhaps you become a superstar quarterback, lightning fast wide receiver or even a defensive powerhouse?

CONTROL YOUR DESTINY
As your reputation improves, you will gain the attention of bigger and better teams. Do you stay loyal to your current team or move on? Do you sign for your favourite team? Are you ready to make the jump to the professional game?

LIVE THE LIFE
As you build your career, various decisions and events will mould you as a person. Do you chase the cash? Are you a team player or focus on your own individual needs? Do you seek fame or prefer a life of solitude?

PLAYER CONTRACTS
Negotiate contracts to ensure you get the deal you deserve! Perhaps you add a bonus for reaching the play-offs or for becoming the team MVP? You need to make sure you get the deal you want, after all, if you are good at something never do it for free!

HELP IS AT HAND
One thing is for sure, you’ll need help. Hire agents, coaches, stylist and various other people to help you become more than just a player. After all, there's endorsement deals awaiting the right player!

ARE YOU THE BEST
From thousands of players, you can see your progression from rookie all the way to veteran. Can you reach the top and become the All-Star MVP?

Prove it…
